oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Bradley Myatt and Sarah Russell Myatt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Bradley Myatt and Sarah Russell Myatt. Myatt was a private in Co. D, 49th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He became a POW on August 17, 1863, in Memphis after being captured at LaGrange, Tenn. He took the oath of allegiance on August 20, 1863.
